document.title: Water (Extract)
document.citation: Simple English Wikipedia: “Water”. Retrieved from https://simple.wikipedia.org/wiki/Water on 20 Aug 2015.
document.body: Water is the most common liquid on Earth. It covers about 71.4% of the Earth. Pure water has no smell, taste, or color. If water gets very cold (below 0 degrees Celsius), it freezes and becomes ice. If water gets very hot (above 100 degrees Celsius), it boils and becomes steam.
